data.persona: I am a guard of the knight's guards. I protect the castle. I have met the king many times.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Throne.
A golden throne be-speckled with many precious stones. It glints in every eye that falls upon it. It is 20 ft tall and 5 ft wide. Swords from enemies of the king line the back of the chair.
There's two golden thrones, two swords, and two precious stones here.
The courtier is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must retrieve my sword from my quarters before I meet with and follow the courtier.
data.mid_motivation: I have been tasked to have a carriage ready for the courtier to use.
data.long_motivation: I must follow the courtier and take him to another kingdom for delegation purposes.
